values:
Sorry people I just have totally forgotten to write or update in so long.

But summer is so fun and yesterday was one of those fun days.

I was at Emma's with Carli and because of the weather we went outside and used the Sprinkler. Then we got the idea to make a slip and slid, so we used garbadge bags. Once we were decked out in our Garbadge get-up we ran and slid on the muddy ground. It may not sound like fun, but when your in a bathing suit with a garbage bag over you, sliding on the ground, anything can be fun, especially that :) Minus the extremly hot weather, summers been fun. How bout yours?

~Cait

P.S

Looking forward to Kyle's grad party!

Hola,

I like it how I wasn't sick all winter and now I have a little cold.
But that doesn't stop me:)

So Tuesday won my Tennis Match,:p Wednesday got hit in the face in gym with a lacross ball,didn't hurt but my face felt like it was going to swell, Today watched all the boys screem in the lunch room when it thundered. And tomorrow, can't wait!!! 

Later Gaters,
Cait

OMG!!

Today I won my first Doubles match in Tennis with Jamie G.!! I'm so excited!! ( Sorry PJ that I played without you:(

!!!!!!!!!!!!HAPPY EARLY BIRTHDAY ALYSSA!!!!!!!!!!!!

P.S -I'm going to try and call you on Friday okies:)

Also I will update next week when I get back from Myrtle Beach!! OMG can't wait!!

Hugs<3

Cait

Today...

-I played tennis with PJ, Alyssa, and Katie

-Went to Walmart with Katie for Myrtle Beach stuff

-Went to Donkey Basketball, omg totally cool and we are so going to have to do that next year. Hightlight of that was when Joe's donkey went in to the Commons.

- Then stayed for the dance, which was lots of fun, danced with a lot of people...Robbie being one of them and then now im home.

Hugs:p

Cait

Well,
I just recently got home from school, that was the longest time I have ever been at school...and now I have to get my butt in gear and do my homework...

Carli and Emma, good luck meeting your exchange students!!!

And anyone in AFS and wants to do the dance, practice is at 3:00 tomorrow...

Cait:P

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!APRIL FOOLS DAY TOMORROW!!!!!!!!!!!

Ahhhh!! 
This stupid sports meeting better be worth going to, or else that will make me mad...

Only about two weeks...I can't wait until Myrtle Beach.

Blah Blah Blah,

Today is very boring, all I have been doing is cleaning for Easter tomorrow...I'm having a blast!!
Hmmm I want to dye my hair, what should I do...? 

Gotta go and clean some more...yippy!
Cait

Today,

Emma came over and we played video games...she's really good:) Randomly Carli and Chelsea stoped by to show us their new Salvation Army clothes, I enjoyed their funky hats they were wearing. 
Then just recently I finally showered and got dressed, but I got angry at my T-shirt I got from the Save the Rainforest catologe. So I cut he sleeves and collar off, and now I like it. 

Call me weird, but I want to go back to school, mostly because of tennis.
Well talk later I have a headache...blah
Caitlin

My highlight of today was the fact that I froze my butt off in Tennis practice while playing outside in the snow. But it was fun, I would just like fair warning for next time so I can wear snowpants and my hat and scarf. 

Friday, no school, can't wait...especially about sleeping in.
Then Easter...anyone doing anything interesting for that? 

Easter's at my house this year, so I get to stay in my room while the Gray family and the Coolack family converse. (my mom's side(coolack) and my dad's side(gray))

Anywho, I have so much work to do.

Later-Cait:P

Today,

I went shopping with my mom. It was one of those mother daughter bonding days. I saw Robots, it was very funny, but the best part was when the ticket guy, who was extremely cute, kept staring me down and smiling. My mom was like omg! I just laughed, because I was seeing a kids movie with my mom! :)

I got a lot of shirts for the summer and Myrtle Beach, checked out some hott guys that Carli would love, tried on a dress that had Chrissy written all over, and totally saw something that was made for Emma, I had fun seeing things for my friends, more than for me.

I can't wait until it's warm again...and until schools out, till then,

Hugs-Cait

The Dance,
The dance was awsome, we made around 500 dollars...hurray for us :P
I totally new how many jelly beans there were, because I had to count a bag and do some mental math with Noni, but that wouldn't be fun to "guess" like everyone else did. Anywho I got a really good workout and afterward when everyone left, Chrissy and I totally pulled out are Charles Angels moves and went around while my ring tone played Mission Impossible...SWEET!

I really enjoyed our dance, I hope everyone else did too.

Hugs<3,
Cait:P

Okay, I'm going to advertise...

Tomorrow:  FRESHMAN DANCE....

Be there or be square....

This goes out to 7th-9th....

Later-Cait

HAPPY ST. PATRICKS DAY!!!

Today,

I went bowling with CJ Simpson for four hours, my fingers ache. I had lots of fun, Mark and his"girlfriend" Bailey were there along with my cousin, Kyle and my brother.

Carli and I got some awsome Bling Rings :)

And what I'm looking forward to this week is The Freshman Dance-hosted by us, and Emma's brother is the DJ...whoot whoot, I can't wait!!!

Tennis practice starts tomorrow, and I have no friends to practice with, I guess I'm going to be making some new friends.

Much love,

Cait..........

P.S

The play is over and I kinda miss it :( The cast party was fun.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!!!!

Thank you Emma and Carli for my wonderful presents and to everyone else who wished me a happy birthday, even if you didn't thats okay:)

And I want to wish a Happy Birthday to my grandpa whose birthday is today (even though he died 13 years ago)

Happy Birthday Grandpa!

To finish my day I have play practice, so see everyone in the play there!

Love, Cait

At the moment I am at CJ Simpson's and we are looking for really funny jokes...

Anyone got any?

 

Reply with your answers please....

Try to beat this,

Why doesn't Tigger have any friends? ...

 

 

He plays with Pooh!

Home sweet Home....

Vacation goes by too fast. Man I hope Spring Break doesn't fly by like this...

Anyway.....College was fun, can't wait to go myself. The Y was a bit dissapointing, because there wasn't really anyone cute and my age...dam. Then Chad, a person that worked at the Y was amazingly hott....and amazingly funny....he was very sarcastic.

Can't it just be Tuesday again, so I could go snowboarding and go back to college.....?

But hey there's next February:)

Later, Cait

Well,

I went to the Y with my sis today, because thats where she works and her coworker was hilarious!! 
Plus hott! 

Wow....I love college...I'm definately coming back here next Winter Break.

Can't wait!!!

College Life

First day here and I'm already having fun....

Whoot Whoot

And I still have three days left:)

 

-Later, Cait

Clarie your on!!! whaaaa whaaaaa (evil laugh)

 

Later....

 

SNOWBOARDING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

whoot whoot :)

At ski club....

If it weren't icy I'm pretty sure that I would have made it down the hill without falling (as many times as I did). But when I went down the bunny the first time I got there I had a really bad fall and my board twisted one way when my legs twisted the other way. 
Well to make a long story short I either pulled a musle in my left left or tore it...I can't bend it that well and hardly walk on it, so I'm going to see what its like tomorrow and then determind if I want to go this friday to Bristol. 
Carli said that Bristol is much bigger and stuff, so I don't want to go to it if I can't really walk on my leg to begin with. 
But I don't know...

I'll wait until tomorrow....

Cait

Yesterday was fun....

Went to the boys basketball game, where the J.V lost and the Varsity won. I'm really getting into school sports as long as I'm not playing them myself.

It was a crack up, because Chrissy was practicing her dance that she was going to bust out with maybe tomorrow and it was hilarous:)

Then Carli spent the night because she desperlately needed a shower since her bathroom is being remodled. That was fun...I didn't go to bed until late...but it was worth it.

Then today...

Carli went home early, probably because she's not used to eating breakfast than I gave her easy mac for breakfast....I had a craving for mac and cheese:)

Blah Blah...

Fun, more fun, I just love school...yah! (intense sarcasm)

And now off to do what I do best...homework...and reading....lovely.

Have fun,

Later...

I made it,

I believe I did an exceptional good job as a first timer. I decided not to take a lesson, because when I saw other people taking lessons, I didn't really like how they teach. So Chris (O'Sulleven) was practically my teacher and Carli of course.

The after affects...

Oh, boy, my entire body is sore. My neck hurts, most likely from landing directly on my back a couple of times. My butt was the main thing I kept landing on, I'm pretty sure that that is one giant bruise. Then my knees were the next main thing I kept landing on and my left knee is a huge bruise and my other knee has tiny bruises on it. Then when I fell once I pull a ligiment I thing in my leg where it conects to the hip. Its hard to walk, but I don't mind. And at one point when I was with Carli and Chris (Treat) I hit ice and fell landing on my wrist, I thought I nearly broke it, but then I felt my fingers after about a minute. I got up and started again. I'm hard core...:) 

Now I can't wait until next Friday, Snowboarding is really fun:)

Later...I'm going to attempt to go to the Mall and return pants

I'm going to skip my little Christmas intro, because I'm sure everyone is tired of reading about what people got.

Anywho...

Today was a fun day, I got to bond with my sister for more than a half hour, because I have barely been home, and when I am, I'm am usually on the phone.

I went to Hamlin with my sister after she got back from Brockport with my cousins and my brother (there're here now). We went into the Hamlin Subway, yum yum. Then we met my mom at Tops so she could pay for all the junk food and soda that I will be needing for New Years.

Off to the library with my sister...I got two books and I still have to read five other books sometime before the vaca is over...I think I can pull it off.

But what I thought was the best part of my day so far was coming home from Hamlin. My sister and I sort of got "lost" in Kendall, well as lost as you can get without actually being lost. We got lost trying to find Chris's house so my sister knew where to pick me up (with the rest of the girls) after the party. It took us like 20 mins to find it as we listen to Blink 182.

To some people this may not be their hightlight of the day, because they were stuck in a car and driving around aimlessly in Kendall, but the simplest things are whats worth wild...

You can always have fun, but when your practically doing nothing is when it's the best.

Merry Christmas and A Happy New Year!!!!

 

I'm not going to update for a while....

Later:)

JANUARY 20th!!!

I GET MY BRACES OFF!!! YIPPEE:)

I am going to make that day a holiday:)

Thats all I had to say...

MERRY CHRISTMAS!

To my fellow readers,

Sorry I have not updated in a while...

My weekend was fun...I finished my last minute Christmas shopping and then hung out with Carli....fun fun:)

Then Monday...oh boy....

My sister, my mother, and I were all talking and laughing really hard, so I didn't know what my mom had said.

-Me, "Did you just say you wanted me to make kids?"

-My mom, "Nooo! You shouldn't know how to make kids anyway!"

-Me, "MOM, I'm not stupid!"

-My sister, "It's like horizontal dancing!!"

Hahaha, "horizontal dancing"- that was my hightlight of the evening.

Annnnddddd there was today.....

Boring, I felt sick to my stomach, until I went to gym class and the physical activity made me better, a miracle:)

And then I stayed after...it was fun, except for the whole "you have to stay in the commons and ask for permission to leave" deal...LAME AND RETARDED.....

 

Now....homework time.....what fun...yes! (I enjoy my over excitement)

Later:)

Beauty,

THe most beautiful thing I saw today was when I was waiting for the bus. The sun was rising over the trees and with the colors purple and pink vibrating in the sky. It was beautiful no doubt, but the air was still and all I could her as silence, as the snow lay gently on the ground and trees....

Then all that can be ruined when your science teacher yells at the class because we are suppose to adomatically know everything....
And when you break your sister's car door...

But the world still holds more beauty that theres still yet to see...

For now:)

Today,

School, gah, I'll skip that. 

Then after school....heh

Carli Jo came over and we worked on Science then I cooked her some eggs, a grilled cheese, and made orange juice for her. Then she played ping pong with my brother, I watched....(felion refexes Car...heh:) Then I cracked her back, like 218794792347293 times and massauged it. She did the same, only instead of massauging my back, she decides to beat me up instead....heh. Theeeennnnnnnnn we had some more fun, she decides to pull a magic trick that makes me want to scream in fear. Instead of pulling rabbits out of a hat, she swallows her ring and coughs it back up...omgosh it was so scary, I thought she was going to die...I was freaking out....heh, I nearly had a mild heart attack...
After a while later, she left...aka like five minutes ago. 
Annnddd I'm leaving too

Buenos Noche
Addios
Hausta Luega!
Tiene divertido!

NEW YORK,

It was amazing! If you ever had the chance to go, go, because you will really like it. Only try to go on a good day when it isn't raining:) Anyway, I could wrtie like five pages if I wanted to go into detail, but I'm not going to. I had lots of fun and then woke up at 1 in the afternoon to see my sister:)She came home from college today. But I took tons of pictures and I am going to make a scrap book, so that should be fun. 

And now I am going to go sleep, or do something lazy....
Have fun
Later

New York City!!!!!!!!!!!! Its only in like two days!!!!!!!!!! OMGOSH I can't wait!!!!!!!!!!!

hmmmm....

I am proud of myself, because I did my science homework all by myself:) (I am giving myself a pat on the back:) 

Anywho...I am now gonig to do my gym homework.

Later...

My weekend was interesting...

Friday,

1. Went to Carli's and stayed really late
2. Came home and went to bed

Saturady,

3. Got up at 7:00 and got ready to be at my aunt's at 8:30-9:00
4. Baked cookies all day with Carli and my family:)...yum yum
5. Went back home for about half an hour, found out my father bought surround sound for the livingroom so now I feel like I'm at the movies...hott
6. Went back to Carli's and hung for about two hours
7. Then went with her to her Aunt Paula's to babysit
8. I zoned in and watched Ella in Enchanted, good movie
9. Then I took down Jermey (her cousin) 
10. We put in 13 gonig on 30 and when it was about half way through Jermey decided to get sick
11. He threw up all over Carli, that looked hott, then threw up all over the bath top...even hotter
12. After he was finished and I was sure I wasn't gonig to puke I tried cleaning it out...that didn't work to well...ewwwwww 
13. After that I went back to Carli's, spent the night

Sunday,

14. We woke up at like 12:30 
15. We did nothing besides lay in her room all day bumming it till 8-ish
16. I decided to call my dad
17. I got to spend the night again
18. I went shopping in Carli's woredrobe
19. Found myself a very cute outfit, that I like so well:)
20. Then watched Charmed and The Mountain
21. Then we decided to go to bed, but found ourselfs talking till like 12:00 fun!

Monday

22. School was boring, like always
23. Came home to an empty house that I had not seen in like three days, a bit weird
24. Spent 4 and a half hours on homework...gah, gag me grrrr....ridiculous
25. And now I am talking to my friends online...fun, fun:)

Later...

Ya....

I'm tired and was on my feet all day baking cookies....unlike Miss Taylor, I am a fabulous cookie maker:)

I took decided to join Carli in socializing with "certian people", but I got enough off that and took a nap, because I'm cool like that.

Anywho....going to kidsit:)

Later

When I got to Carli Jo's....

We listened to Launch, specifically My Chemcial Romance, The Killers, Snow-Partrol, Goo Dolls, Gywn Stefani, Vanessa Carlton...and many more. 

After we decided to take tons of pictures. I got all dressed up and Carli did my makeup so I looked like a doll or someone who was a drug addict...did I mention a whore as well...

It was muy divirtido!!

In the end...I ended up with her teeth marks...ow...and lots of eyeshadow, mascara, and eyeliner.

It was quite and enjoyable experience.

Tomorrow, I am off to make Christmas cookies with my family and Carli Jo, then off to babysit with Carliiii...its going to be quite an interesting day tomorrow...heh :)

Have fun :)

Today......well, lunch time and our "bathroom humor"....hahaha...

Off to Tops to go food shopping, then to Carli Jo's where Paul will be too, (mostlikely)

Gotta Run...later

Your not listening

 

I am invisiable if I don't

tell you. You'll write my

lines however it suits you.

I haven't lied, but you're not

listening.

 

I needed your

affection. I didn't think

it would affect me. You

are asking me to change

without a word.

 

We have in common trusting

no one. I rely on you

to want the wrong things.

You long for the pain

I can give you.

 

Won't be long before I leave

you now we've solved

the initial mystery.

Couldn't we just be

patron saints?

 

I am invisible if I don't

tell you. You'll write my

lines however it suits you.

I haven't lied; it's time you

started listening.

~Hard Love, by Ellen Wittlinger

Alrighty,

Today was fun, I really loved lunch, because Emma ate with us today, and she kept making fun of me, (yes I enjoy laughing at myself). I was afraid in Science, because Baldwin exploaded on us for not knowing our "relationships" I was preparing myself to run out the door if things got brutal...heh. Anyway, I have tons of homework, and the only good thing is my mum is getting pizza from Pizza Hut, with breadsticks...yum.

 

I wish...

~ That I could clone Carli Jo (I need her for the weekend)

~ It was Christmas vaca

~ I was done Christmas shopping

~ It would snow, or just get warm again, not this crappy weather...

~ My sister was home from colledge

~ The New York City trip was tommorow

~ I get a cool part in the play

What do you wish...?

Thank You Claire for my fabulous layout!!!!!

I gave her the picture and she did the rest, wonderful, I love it!!!!!

I don't know what to update about...I'm just so excited about my layout, its freaking hott!!!

Enjoy!!!

I'm extremly tired to do anything, I'll be more elaborate tomorrow maybe....

AHHHHH.........I hate school!!!

I read, I watched Underworld, read, did homework, read. Hard Love, I highly recomend it. 
And now I'm gonig to be socialble.

Today...

I put up my Christmas Tree, but never finished decorating it. I hate this, I am so not in the Christmas mood, I think I had more enthusiasm for Halloween than I have now for Christmas. I wish I could be ten again, because Carli was right, I was more excited about holidays when I was still a child than I am now. Maybe when the 25th starts to roll around I might show more excitment, for now, I continue to read Hard Love and ignore my moms pleads for help with decorating the lights.

Anyway....a Hallmark movie is on tonight and it has my name on it, its either Hallmark or It's A Wonderful Life, I like that movie, but I prefer White Christmas. 

For now, I read...

Thanksgiving....

 

I slept in till like noon, than got ready for two, however no Gray family arrives on time. We actually ate quite early this time, thats surprising. I loaded up on my grandma's white bread, and some turkey (I am a very picky eater). Then I drank too much Ginger Ale and Orange soda. After we ate, the dad's came in and put on the football game, which I was forced to watch for about 20 mins instead of Harry Potter. I couldn't take it anymore, so off to the kitchen. I bonded with my sister some more, when the Ginger Ale started to kick in. I was sort of hyper by than, it was kind of funny. I ate a lot of brownies with mint chocolate chip frosting for desert and drank more soda. I feel bloaded now....I want to puke. Anyway, part my dad and my uncle went on and on about our Globale Warming, which than got everyone in the kitchen to talk about it, and when my dad gets talking he won't stop until he proves that hes right, when half the time hes actually wrong. In my head I was like "Oh boy..." That was an interesting conversation. Since I was utterly bored seeing as my sister and me are the ownly teenage girls there, it wasn't very fun, so I came home early...and left my cousin there...ha!

Side note: my cousin Sarah that lived with me last year came up, it was quite a surprise, and now I have to entertain her...which means all the plans I was going to make I can't do....this sucks....

At least tomorrow I will still be going with my friend Katie to the mall for her 16th Birthday! And out to dinner, or lunch, I'm not sure.

Tell me what are you thankful for...?
I watched A Walk To Remember and cried, I absolutely love that movie! Only it's so sad...tear...

I should let him go...but will I have to hold on to afterwards...?

"We will rise to the occasion,
Which is life" ~True Believer

I hope to find my own meaning of this....

Today....

I got up early to go shopping. Carli helped me pick out snowboarding pants, I got black ones. Then off to Borders Books, (if only I had all me money) I could have bought out the store. I ended up getting, born confused, by Tanuja Desai Hidier, after Carli recomended it, it sounds really good. I am currently reading True Believer by Virginia Euwer Wolff, for the second time. True Believer is a mix between Hard Love, and Speak. After Borders, we went to a Chinesse Shop for dumplings, my favorite food in the world. Then off to Greece Mall, to find a birthday present for my friends, 16th birthday. I was successful, and I got Carli's gift for Chrismas. By the time shopping was over, I was exausted, and now my parents friends are over and were are having a fancy dinner. Tomorrow I get my hair cut, I can't wait, maybe I will do something drastic, or not.

"We will rise to the occasion, which is life"

~ True Believer                                                                                                  Carli:

I'm outty:)                                                                                 Cucumbers, and the TOPS stalker...

                                                                                                                           hahaha:)

So, yeah I'm beat....I have too much homework to do, to many projects....blah!! Just wait until Thanksgiving Break, were going to have double that!! Thats unless our teachers feel generous.

Anywho, tomorrow I am off to the Dome Sale in Henrietta to buy snowboarding pants...Carli's coming with! I'm really going to go through with this, just bring a camera, its going to be a show....

I'm outy:)
<FONT color=#000066 size=4>I give up. Believe what you want to...</FONT>

I am going to deleate my yesterdays entries. I may be able to delete my words, but I won't be able to delete my feelings. If I could, than life would be easier.

I shouldn't be punished for talking about what I feel, if this is what happens than how the hell am I suppose to open up and let people understand, how the hell am I suppose to show who the "real me" is all about?

When I posted my entry yesterday, I wasn't looking for a battle among my friends, I wasn't looking to end a friendship that means so much to me. All I wanted was for people to understand, but I guess that wasn't possible and instead you guys took it in the wrong way.

I am going to start over, I am going to let people see the real me, because I am tired of these games of trying to fit in so everyone will like me. Only I forgot who the "real me" was. I haven't been 100% fake all this time, but I haven't been 100% real either. It's funny, because I don't even know what real is either.

I feel that if I try this then things can get better, because thats how I made friends with Emma, Carli, Casey, Chrissy, Jamie, and Claire. Even Dale, but I don't think he remembers much. These are friendships that I don't want to loose, not over this.

I'm not asking for us to forget all about it, I just don't want it to tear us apart. I'm ready to change, because you guys are right, I do act differently around certian people and I don't want to do that anymore. But I don't want to do this alone, please, I am sorry and all I want is forgiveness. Can you just give me that...

~Cait
